changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.attribute_meta_attribute ( id bigserial NOT NULL, attribute bigint NOT NULL, meta_attribute bigint NOT NULL, numeric_value numeric, boolean_value int2, text_value character varying, binary_value bytea, attribute_value bigint, integer_value integer, timestamp_value timestamp, -- If the Attribute has a timestamp value, it is stored in this column unit_value bigint, unit bigint, notes character varying, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, CONSTRAINT attribute_attribute_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT attribute_attribute_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (meta_attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT attribute_attribute_attribute_value_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute_value) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT attribute_attribute_base_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT attribute_attribute_unit_value_fkey FOREIGN KEY (unit_value) REFERENCES ruleform.unit (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT attribute_attribute_unit_fkey FOREIGN KEY (unit) REFERENCES ruleform.unit (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT attribute_attribute_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT attribute_attribute_base_attribute_key UNIQUE (attribute , meta_attribute , sequence_number ), CONSTRAINT valid_value CHECK ((ruleform.null_zero(binary_value) + ruleform.null_zero(numeric_value) + ruleform.null_zero(boolean_value) + ruleform.null_zero(text_value) + ruleform.null_zero(attribute_value) + ruleform.null_zero(integer_value) + ruleform.null_zero(unit_value)) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
